Posts.EditableText:
Hi. So I've been trying to make a Pokemon-based game. But I got this error message.

Failed to load game

Failed to load game due to the following errors:
*Error: Exception of type 'System.OutOfMemoryException' was thrown.

Basically, it won't load.

I tried to make a "chikorita", and I put it in a chest, but now there are two Chikoritas 'cause I already made one as an object, and I didn't know that would happen.

EDIT---
Nevermind, it's fixed. I'm good.
